title.en: The Basics of Psychology of the Children with Special Needs
Introduction to the Abnormal Psychology and Diagnostics

description.en: This course deals with some specific developmental and pedagogical issues concerning children with learning disabilities.
description.et: Keskendutakse õpiraskustega laste kognitiivse arengu iseärasustele ja õpiraskuste eristamisele.

objectives.en: Understanding the psychological essence of learning disabilities

learning_outcomes.en: - describes the current approaches to children's learning difficulties;
- describes the psychological essence and behavioral manifestations of learning difficulties;
learning_outcomes.et: - kirjeldab erinevate õpiraskuste psühholoogilisi eripärasid ja käitumuslikke väljendusi

learning_outcomes.en: - differentiates and compares different types of learning difficulties;
- describes and reasons the differences of emotional and social development in children with learning difficulties;
learning_outcomes.et: - põhjendab õpiraskustega laste emotsionaalse ja sotsiaalse arengu erisusi

learning_outcomes.en: - gives examples of developing children with learning difficulties in compliance with the main principles.
learning_outcomes.et: - toob õpiraskustega laste arendamise näiteid arendamise põhimõtetest lähtuvalt

learning_outcomes.en: - can independently and in group read and summarize scientific articles.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab iseseisvalt ja rühmas lugeda ja refereerida erialaseid teadusartikleid.
